DOC.criteria: Inclusion_Criteria : Observation criterion : able provide write informed consent accordance Good Clinical Practice ( GCP ) local legislation idiopathic Parkinsons disease accord United Kingdom Parkinsons Disease Society Brain Bank Diagnostic Criteria Parkinsons disease show impairment cognitive function ( MMSE score ? 24 ) without symptom depression ( full range ) stable antiParkinson/antidepressive treatment least 1 month enter study concomitant antidepressant treatment state observation period previously undergo PD surgery
